summary: This Ain't California is a celebration of the lust for life, a contemporary documentary trip into the world of roller boarding in the German Democratic Republic. A coming-of-age tale of ... See full summary »
cast: David Nathan|Anneke Schwabe|Bill Clinton|Zaneta Fuchsová|Kai Hillebrand|Erich Honecker|Helmut Kohl|Gerhard Schröder
title: This Ain't California
